name: Benetint Liquid Lip + Cheek Blush Stain
about: What it is:A collection of fan-fave lip and cheek tints that come in a range of shades‚Äîall long-wearing, non-drying, and transfer-proof..Ingredient Callouts:Free of formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance..What Else You Need to Know:Cherry, mango, pink lemonade‚Äîwhatever tint color you're craving, Benefit Cosmetics has an option for you. These long-wearing tints have non-drying formulas that apply and build easily and feel comfortable on lips and cheeks. Apply one coat with the precise, doe-foot applicator for a sheer hint of tint or layer for more vibrant color that lasts all day. The formula is also smudge-, transfer-, and kiss-proof.
ingredients: Water (Aqua), Polysorbate 20, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Hydroxide, Carmine (Ci 75470), Methylparaben, Fragrance (Parfum), Tetrasodium Edta, Geraniol, Linalool, Hexyl Cinnamal, Citronellol, Maltodextrin, Benzyl Salicylate, Bht...Product ingredient listings are updated periodically. Before using a Benefit Cosmetics product, please read the ingredient list on the packaging of your product to be sure that the ingredients are appropriate for your personal use.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Glide onto lips and layer to build intensity. .-For ombre lips, dab on the inner part of lips and blend outward with fingertip. Dot and blend quickly onto cheeks for a long-lasting flush..-Beauty tip: Layer your two favorite tints to make your own custom color for lips or cheeks. Or wear under your favorite lipstick or gloss.
